rule202020.title: 20-20-20 Rule
rule202020.message: Time to rest your eyes! Look at an object 20 feet (6m) away for 20 seconds.

postureCheck.title: Posture Check
postureCheck.message: Sit up straight, keep your wrists flat, and don't lean too close to the screen.

hydration.title: Time to Hydrate
hydration.message: A glass of water helps your brain stay sharp. Let's drink up!

longBreak.title: You Deserve a Long Break!
longBreak.message: You've been doing great work on this project for {hours} hours! Take a 15-minute break to refresh your mind.

creativeBoost.title: Creative Boost!
